params.0: Wasteland - a dead land filled with lava, dead trees and rocks.
params.1: Plateau - a platform of rock amidst a sea of lava with very few obstacles.
params.2: Sylvan Glade - an arena filled with trees that block line-of-sight.
params.3: Forsaken Quarry - an arena filled with small rocks that do not block line-of-sight.
params.4: Turrets - rangers and mages may like to ascend the many turrets in this arena to fire down at targets below.
params.6: Soggy Swamp - a waterlogged marshland filled with roots and rotten trees.
params.7: Ghastly Swamp - like the soggy swamp, but with aggressive ghasts to rot your food or steal your health.
params.8: Northleach Quell - a snowy area filled with sunken boats and broken bits of wood.
params.5: Clan Cup Arena - adapted from the arena used in the 2013 Clan Cup.
params.9: Gridlock - a huge 4-way multi-mountain map suited for KoTH modes with rangers and mages.
params.10: Ethereal - A strange realm in the clouds, with teleports to use and destroy.
params.11: Classic -  The original Clan Wars Classic.
params.12: Lumbridge Castle - the iconic castle and its courtyard.
